section.title: Technical data
section.p:
Speller tool:
Polderland command line tool

section.title: Result summary
section.p: Number of spelling errors with correct suggestion: 176
Number of spelling errors with correct suggestion in top 5: 172
Number of spelling errors with only wrong suggestions: 50
Number of spelling errors with no suggestions at all: 9
section.note: *) Forced: The Polderland command line speller will by default ignore input words starting with a non-alphabetic character. Thus, words starting with e.g. numbers or hyphens are ignored, giving the impression that they are correct input. Such words can be forced to be treated as spelling errors, but then all such words are considered spelling errors. That will be correct in the case of typos-type input, but not necessarily for other types of input data, which means the results can be somewhat schewed in those cases. Normally, the number of forced spelling errors will be very low, and won't have a big impact on the results anyway, but please check the forced cases. Forced spelling errors are marked with a yellow background in the table below.

section.title: Spelling errors with only incorrect suggestions
